reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Contributo italiano al Development Partners' support to the implementation of 2nd Growth and Transformation Plan (GTP II)

description.narrative: L'iniziativa mira a sostenere gli sforzi del Governo Etiope per ridurre la povertà nel Paese e a miglioratre l'impatto della cooperazione allo sviluppo, attraverso attività di assistenza tecnica e capacity building per il corretto monitoraggio della realizzazione del secondo piano nazionale quinquennale di sviluppo.

The initiative aims to support the efforts of the Ethiopian Government to reduce poverty in the country and to improve the impact of development cooperation, through technical assistance and capacity building activities for the correct monitoring of the implementation of the second development plan.

UNDP - UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME ALT

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: PUBLIC SECTOR POLICY AND ADMINISTRATIVE MANAGEMENT

tag.narrative: Create sound policy frameworks at the national, regional and international levels, based on pro-poor and gender-sensitive development strategies, to support accelerated investment in poverty eradication actions
End poverty in all its forms everywhere
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Respect each country’s policy space and leadership to establish and implement policies for poverty eradication and sustainable development
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
